newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Nigerian plane makes emergency landing in Israel.
newsitem.headline: Nigerian plane makes emergency landing in Israel.

text.p: A Nigerian passenger plane safely made an emergency landing at Tel Aviv's Ben-Gurion Airport on Sunday after reporting mechanical difficulties, Israel's Itim news agency said.
The plane, which had not been en route to Israel, was escorted to the airport by Israeli air force fighters after its pilot asked permission to land at Ben-Gurion for repairs, Itim said.
The report, which could not be immediately confirmed with Israeli aviation officials, did not give the plane's original flight plan or say how many passengers were aboard.
